Day 4 of Our Alaskan Cruise- Seeing the Hubbard Glacier ( Don't forget to click on a picture to see a larger version of it)

Looking better--- clouds go away,please!
What a lonely looking place
People are beginning to gather on the bow on a deck below to look

Hubbard Glacier is the blue ridge of ice in the distance

A bit of ice floating around!

Many are thinking of the Titantic when seeing this 'little' iceberg. Compare size to people on bow!
Remember that 70%-80% of an iceberg is submerged!
